Name: 1000 Needles
About the game: 1000 Needles - is the simplest 2D platformer with dynamic gameplay and nice graphics where you will have to do various levels playing as a porcupine. The main idea is very simple. Collect the items you need. They'll help you to repair a water pressure tower. Be careful and watch out obstacles, think of your walkings. Only then you will win. But remember-you have the only life to do the level. After your all collecting on the level you will rebuild the tower and be able to come to the next level. KEY FEATURES: - One life to complete the level. - Dynamic and hardoce gameplay. - Relaxing soundtrack. - Suitable for people of all ages.
